petNameAdd:
1) State of Assam
    Advocate - Tapan Kumar Bhattacharya

business_details.Business: Accused is present. Judgment delivered in the open court.The prosecution has failed to prove its case u/s 448/376(l)/313/323/506 I.P.C and section 4 of the POCSO Act against the accused beyond all reasonable doubt.Held, the accused is not guilty u/s 448/376(l)/313/323/506 I.P.C and section 4 of the POCSO Act.The accused is acquitted and set at liberty.The bail bond stands cancelled and the bailor is discharged from all liabilities.The case is disposed of.
